messages.message:
uh… dumb question… how do I submit a git commit for review? it’s been a long time since I used git for version control at work :stuck_out_tongue:

i made some changes to the release notes, committed, but not sure how to submit for review :smile:

Hey Peter, you can request a review by creating a Pull Request in GitHub.

You can push your changes to github `git push origin <your branch>`  (make sure to use a different branch than master/main if you’ve not forked) and then create a PR from github to the main repo/branch. There you’d see an option to request reviews in the right panel.

This is an old document detailing the GH workflow:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/18O09-Jg7xnMxJjozZl_PjQB7eB-U1rdmm_Y4vrJv-zw/edit#heading=h.rgd4e8a4sh67
